subject: Basketball
Books and Literature
Children and Childhood
Homeless Persons
organizations: Episcopal Church of the Intercession (Manhattan, NY)
lead_paragraph: Carlton Greene, who was a promising basketball player before he became homeless for a time, is the subject of “Still Got Game,” written as a playbook for life.
snippet: Carlton Greene, who was a promising basketball player before he became homeless for a time, is the subject of “Still Got Game,” written as a playbook for life.
